page.title: 08Two Carpenters
page.content:
Our Dad is a carpenter and he makes things out of wood. Recently he made a cot. He also sometimes works in his friend's chemist shop and then he comes home very late. On Saturdays and Sundays he doesn't work. We go out on Saturdays. We go to town in the morning. On Sundays he stays in bed. Then on Monday he can go to work again or go and help his friend. Nishi & Naleenee Leelah
My Dad is a carpenter. He has his own workshop.He has lots of machines and they are very dangerous. Although he works by himself he works very quickly.
